message: As Mink leaves, a colorful cockatoo flies into the room. It's carrying something in its talons.
If I'm not mistaken, I saw it on Mink's shoulder earlier.
After replying, it flies back out through the door.
While trying to wrap my head around Mink's surprising choice of companion, I pick up my bag and look inside.
Everything's there. My Coil... and my ball of dark blue fur.
